api nawathila hitiye kampas ekata tikak dura.winadi thihak this pahak wage yanawa enna.ee awith eke frant eke idala thawa winadi pahalawak wage awidinna oona"ahasa usata naga giyata nahane ahase radenne" githaya jathika giya una departhamenthuwata yanna.ithin oya gamane wisthara tikak kiyanna weyi nathnam therum yana ekak na.meka therum ganna eka wadagath mokada jiwa widyathmaka kramaya therum ganna me wistharaya athyawashya wena nisa.
me lipiya dakke ada onna magenuth saliyut parak.mona wunath anith ayagen saliyut wadina widiyata liyana oya hari hapanek.mamath oyage blog eka hari aasawen kiyawanawa.

welathiyana de therun gihin thibbath mage hitha ehema deyak piliganna sudanamak thibbe na,eda mam yaluwa ekka wibhageta giya.api denna wibhage liwe wenama panthi kamara dekaka.kipadenek aawith mam innawada kiyala balala yanawanam mathakayi.ee paya deka sahena kalayak wage mata danune.ikmanin gedara ennayi oonekama thibbe mata.yaluwath ekka bas eke aawith gedarata harena wanguwedima mam dakka,ape gedara laga wata pitawe aya ekathuwela innawa.thawakenek ge issarahama ambaagahe sudu kodiyak badinawa.
